attributes.action: Add a checkbox to future referendum voting slips saying I Vote as an Individual
attributes.additional_details: US biased, but what happens in the states, usually happens in the UK https://www.facebook.com/Block-The-Block-Vote-1530634483842845/ -  movement there to block the block vote
attributes.background: In the European Referendum on leaving or staying in the EU, especially but not exclusively in London, there have been none confirmed rumours of forced community block voting not as individuals. Such voting is not at all democratic, and should be negated where possible. A checkbox might help do this.
